headline: AbbVie (NYSE:ABBV) Urges Shareholders To Reject Proposals On Voting Rules And Human Rights Due Diligence
summary: AbbVie (NYSE:ABBV) is navigating significant shareholder activism as it urges opposition to two governance proposals ahead of its May 2025 meeting, fostering investor attention. Despite reporting a Q4 net loss, the company's stock surged by 23% in the last quarter, countering market volatility driven by tariff announcements from the Trump administration, which left major indices like the Dow and S&P 500 in decline. AbbVie's recent product approvals, such as the availability of SKYRIZI in...
